item.description:
Tis a bit o' the Irish we'll be having at McLadden's Irish Publick House the night before St Patrick's Day.  Shepard's Pie, bangers n mash, corned beef and $3.00 Irish draft beers.  Maybe we'll be seein' the wee folk after a few pints.  We will be in the back room, but the front room has a band if you'd like to pop in there for a song or two.

I will be there a few minutes early to take advantage of the Happy Hour menu - look for me in the bar.

Website:  http://www.mcladdens.com/

 

I will collect $1.00 from each attendee.  If you RSVP "Yes" please do show up, or change it by 5pm the day before (3/15/11).
item.why: IT'S THE DAY BEFORE ST PADDY'S DAY - TIME TO ENJOY THE IRISH BEERS ON TAP AT A SPECIAL PRICE!!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: MCLADDEN'S IRISH PUBLICK HOUSE 03/16/11 7:00PM
